name: Last Days of the Empire
description:
"There is a problem with the web-build hence it is disabled, it will enabled when ready please use the windows version for now.  Sorry for the inconvenience..."

The html version is now working and it's is exactly same mechanically as the original submitted version. Have fun!

The age of the great empire is over, corruption and failure to modernize had led to the demise of the once great empire The Empire of Ekulerome is falling, can you ease the fall or perhaps bring the empire to its former glory.

In this faux-rome strategy, you're surrounded by ravaging barbarians. You must defend the borders as the barbarians get more numerous with time. Manage your resources and defend the cities, how long will it take for you to fall?

Most of the icons are taken from freepik

"Icon made by Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com"
